Localization.Name: Jacopo Monocle
Localization.Description: As part of their Dafne collection, Derion is proud to present the Jacopo monocle. This diamond-laminate accessory features a tungsten chain and features the latest upgradable optiVis interface for unmatched comfort.

English.Name: Jacopo Monocle
English.Description: As part of their Dafne collection, Derion is proud to present the Jacopo monocle. This diamond-laminate accessory features a tungsten chain and features the latest upgradable optiVis interface for unmatched comfort.
